fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Organize a raid on an authorized target. 4 Uses
- Organize a raid on any target. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Organizing a raid on a target deals an Astral Powerful attack to them.
- You will lose 1 raid use (starting with the first ability) each night you don't use it, provided you are not roleblocked past immunity or otherwise prevented from using the ability
- You will gain 1 authorized target raid use each time you attack a player.
- If you execute three Sentries, your superiors will deem you incompetent and deal an Overkill attack to you.
- Roleblock immunity
